name: Lava RPC
description: Decentralized RPC, offering $200 worth of monthly credits to qualified founders

name: FastNEAR RPC
description: FastNear RPC sponsorship for NEAR builders! There are 3 monthly plans: Dev $69: 10M/month RPC, API and Neardata requests; Pro $199: 36M/month RPC, API and Neardata requests; Business $499: 100M/month RPC, API and Neardata requests. All plans support virtually unlimited requests per second with access to Mainnet/Testnet regular and archival RPC. FastNear RPC is fast, low-latency, geo-spacial load-balanced, professionally managed, with 100% uptime over the past year.

name: Privy NEAR Accounts
description: NEAR Infrastructure Committee are allocating credits to support up to 500,000 accounts (across the NEAR Ecosystem w/ cap of 50,000 accounts covered per project) created through the Privy x NEAR integration
